name: Panzer Battles Demo
summary: The Panzer Battles Demo is an introduction to the Panzer Battles franchise. This Demo is intended to showcase the diversity of situations the game system can handle as well as provide an opportunity for a new generation of scenario designers to publish their handiwork. It’s also intended to test new game systems and theatres before inclusion in full commercial titles. We hope that with the provision of this free Demo, more players will be introduced to the game system.
